---
title: random data gen
---

```{python}
import polars as pl

import numpy as np
from numpy.random import rand, choice
```


```{python create dataframe}
df = pl.DataFrame({
    "id": np.arange(0, 1_000_000),
    "value": rand(1_000_000),
    "category": choice(["A", "B", "C", "D"], size=1_000_000)
})

```

```{python write file}
df.write_parquet("random.parquet")
```
